Read the passage below and reflect on the questions that follow.

body.attribution: The Holy Bible, New International Version® NIV® Copyright © 1973

verses.1: When the time drew near for David to die, he gave a charge to Solomon his son.
verses.2: “I am about to go the way of all the earth,” he said. “So be strong, act like a man,
verses.3: and observe what the Lord your God requires: Walk in obedience to him, and keep his decrees and commands, his laws and regulations, as written in the Law of Moses.

verses.10: but he did not invite Nathan the prophet or Benaiah or the special guard or his brother Solomon.
verses.11: Then Nathan asked Bathsheba, Solomon’s mother, “Have you not heard that Adonijah, the son of Haggith, has become king, and our lord David knows nothing about it?
